archimate:Stakeholder.name: Stakeholder
archimate:Stakeholder.documentation: The role of an individual, team, or organiazation (or classes thereof) that represents their interest in the outcome of the architecture. Preferably a noun. Has interest/concerns about the organization and its EA, that lead them to change, set , emphazise goals. Example stakeholders: CEO, board, business unit, app architect, customer, ops manager, app user, external legislative authority.
